ValidationRule.description: Prevents editing of profile fields on the household when there are client profile validations outstanding. Allows updates to all other fields.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && RecordType.DeveloperName = "IndustriesHousehold" && Fact_Find_Validations_Outstanding__c = true && NOT(ISCHANGED(Stop_Internal_User_Update__c)) && (ISCHANGED(Planning_to_have_more_children__c) || ISCHANGED(What_are_your_plans_re_more_children__c) || ISCHANGED(OW_total_value_of_contents__c) || ISCHANGED(Giving__c) || ISCHANGED(OW_essential_spending__c) || ISCHANGED(OW_essential_spending_frequency__c) || ISCHANGED(OW_non_essential_spending__c) || ISCHANGED(OW_non_essential_spending_frequency__c) || ISCHANGED(Rent__c) || ISCHANGED(Rent_Frequency__c) || ISCHANGED(Cash__c) || ISCHANGED(Cash_Frequency__c) || ISCHANGED(ISAs__c) || ISCHANGED(ISAs_Frequency__c) || ISCHANGED(Other_Investments__c) || ISCHANGED(Other_Investments_Frequency__c) || ISCHANGED(Pensions__c) || ISCHANGED(Pensions_Frequency__c)) && NOT(ISPICKVAL($User.OW_user_type__c,"Integration"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Client profile validations outstanding. Please complete these before editing fields visible in the customer's profile.
